name: EXPLORING - Checkout Screens - v1.0
description:
What do Amazon's, Etsy's and Ebay's checkout screens have in common? Here is a merged wireframe after analyzing three ecommerce leaders.


Use this UI template to speed up new design work or review an existing screen.
